question.text: When three balls are picked out consecutively from a box containing three white balls and four black balls, which of the following is the lowest probability?

options.text: Probability of the balls picked out in order of black, black, black
Probability of the balls picked out in order of black, black, white
Probability of the balls picked out in order of black, white, black
Probability of the balls picked out in order of white, black, black

question.text: A search is performed by specifying a character string comprised of multiple alphabetic characters and one delimiter character “.” (period). An “*” (asterisk) represents an arbitrary character string with zero or more characters, and a “?” (question mark) represents an arbitrary single character. Which of the following is a character string that matches the character string represented below? X*.Y??

options.text: XY.XYY
XXX.YY
XYX.YXY
YXYX.YXY

question.text: When a sound is recorded in a computer file, it is to be stored as a series of 8-bit encoded data. When the same sound source is sampled at the same sampling frequency and then encoded as a series of 16-bit data in lieu of 8-bit data, which of the following is an appropriate description concerning this encoding?

options.text: The amplitude of the sound can be recorded more finely.
When the recording time is the same, the amount of data becomes smaller.
The CPU load required to process the recorded data decreases.
The upper limit of the frequency that can be recorded becomes higher.

question.text: Which of the following is a search condition for the shaded portion of the Venn diagram below? (Implied: Shaded area represents (B or C) outside of A)
question.images: Implied figure showing Venn diagram A, B, C placeholders referenced in text

options.text: (not A) and (B and C)
(not A) and (B or C)
(not A) or (B and C)
(not A) or (B or C)

question.text: As shown in Figure 1, there is a processing unit which reads two positive integer input values A1 and A2, and then writes two integer output values B1 and B2. B1 is equal to A2, and B2 is the remainder of A1 divided by A2. In Figure 2, two processing units with the same function as the above are connected in series. When A1=15 and A2=6 are given to the left-hand unit in Figure 2, what is the output value of B1 for the right-hand unit?
question.images: Implied figures showing processing units referenced in text

question.text: The data is exchanged between variable A and variable B. When variable TMP is used to temporarily store data, which of the following is the procedure for exchanging data correctly? Here, “x ← y” represents that the data of “x” is replaced with the data of “y”.

options.text: TMP ← A / A ← B / B ← A
TMP ← A / A ← B / B ← TMP
TMP ← B / A ← B / B ← TMP
TMP ← B / A ← B / B ← A

question.text: Which of the following is an explanation of a characteristic of hypertext?

options.text: It has a function for the creation and editing of a range of expressions.
It has a function for the creation and editing of a range of shapes.
It provides a range of templates, and enables their use.
It has a mechanism that enables relevant information to be accessed by embedding a link in any position in a text.

question.text: In the data structure called a queue that is suitable for performing first-in first-out (FIFO) processing, values are stored in the order of “8”, “1”, “6”, and “3”, and then two (2) values are removed consecutively. Which of the following is the last value that is removed?
When the process that is shown in the flowchart is ended, which of the following is the value of x? (Flowchart describes Euclidean subtraction algorithm to find GCD of x=98 and y=42)
question.images: Implied figure showing flowchart referenced in text

question.text: Which of the following is an appropriate combination of words that are inserted into blanks A and B in the description below concerning the execution sequence of instructions in a computer? In a computer, the instructions are executed in the sequence shown below. (1) Refer to the program counter. (2) ___A___ the instruction. (3) Set the program counter to the main memory address of the next instruction. (4) ___B___ the instruction. (5) Execute processing according to the instruction. (6) Return to (1).

options.text: A) Decode B) Read
A) Read B) Decode
A) Read B) Write
A) Write B) Decode

question.text: Which of the following is a method of writing the same data to multiple hard disks simultaneously and improving reliability rather than performance?

options.text: Striping
Paging
Interleaving
Mirroring

question.text: Which of the following is required for an application program to use the peripheral equipment that is connected to a PC?

options.text: Compiler
Device driver
Plug and play
Hot plug

question.text: There is an IoT system that automatically opens and closes the sluice gate for a rice field by measuring the water level in the rice field. Which of the following is the appropriate combination of terms to be inserted into blanks A and B in the figure? (Figure shows data flow from A to IoT server, and signal flow from IoT server to B, controlling the sluice gate.)
question.images: Implied figure showing IoT components referenced in text

options.text: A) Actuator B) IoT gateway
A) Actuator B) Sensor
A) Sensor B) IoT gateway
A) Sensor B) Actuator

question.text: Which of the following is an appropriate description concerning a benchmark test?

options.text: It focuses on input and output instead of the processing structure in the system in order to test if the output are as per the specifications for various input.

It focuses on the internal processing structure of the system and sets test cases that cover conditions such as branching conditions and repetition conditions in order to test if the behavior of the processing is as intended by the design.
It predicts performance of a system to be created before it is designed, by mathematically modeling the behavior of the system and simulating its behavior by using a pseudo program.
It evaluates performance by performing a standard processing on an actual system and comparing the performance such as the time taken for the processing with other systems.

question.text: Among the descriptions A through D concerning measures in a client/server system, which of the following is the list that contains all and only the appropriate items for reducing the response time? A: Establishing a high-speed line between the client and the server, and reducing the time taken to transmit data B: Increasing the number of clients, and reducing the waiting time for users before using clients C: Reducing the time taken for data entry by users on the client’s input screen D: Making the server high-performance, and reducing the server’s processing time

options.text: A, B, C
A, D
B, C
C, D

question.text: In the specification of the capacity of a battery that is embedded in a device such as an IoT device or a smartphone, which of the following is the appropriate meaning of “100mAh”?

options.text: It can discharge a current of 100mA for one (1) hour.
After it is charged for 100 minutes, it can discharge a current for one (1) hour.
It can discharge a current of 1A for 100 minutes.
After it is charged for one (1) hour, it can discharge a current for 100 minutes.

question.text: Which of the following is an appropriate explanation of the virtualization of a server?

options.text: It is a technique for virtually creating computer-generated worlds or immersive environments that users can interact with.
It is a technique for virtually operating the GUI of a remote computer connected via a network by using a local computer.
It is a technique for virtually implementing and operating two or more computers on a single computer.
It is a technique for virtually allocating more memory space than the capacity of main memory by using a particular part of auxiliary storage.

question.text: In the description below concerning a file system, which of the following is an appropriate combination of terms to be inserted into blanks A through C? When files and directories on a PC are managed hierarchically, the directory at the highest level is called the ___A___ directory, and the directory that a user is now manipulating is called the ___B___ directory. A notation that uses the ___B___ directory as its starting point and shows the location of a file or a directory is called a(n) ___C___ path.

options.text: A) current B) root C) absolute
A) current B) root C) relative
A) root B) current C) absolute
A) root B) current C) relative

question.text: Which of the following is an appropriate description concerning the OS for PCs?

options.text: Each PC allows only one (1) type of OS to be installed and run on it.
There is no OS for PCs equipped with a 64-bit CPU.
When an OS is upgraded to a new version, all of the software operating with the old version of the OS cannot be used any more.
There exist some OSs for PCs that can be started up by using an external storage device, such as a CD-ROM and USB memory, other than the hard disk.

question.text: There is a system where a full backup is made after closing time every Sunday, and an incremental backup is made after closing time on Monday through Saturday. On a Wednesday, a failure happened during business hours, so a decision was made to restore data to the state at the closing time on Tuesday by using backup files. Which of the following lists all and only the necessary backup files for restoring data? Here, an incremental backup file means a backup file that contains only the data that has been modified since the previous backup (a full backup or an incremental backup) was made.

options.text: A full backup file on Sunday, incremental backup files on Monday and Tuesday
A full backup file on Sunday, an incremental backup file on Tuesday
Incremental backup files on Monday and Tuesday
An incremental backup file on Tuesday

question.text: Spreadsheet software is to be used to perform a calculation with the monthly sales data for each product shown in the worksheet below. When the expression “COUNTIF(B2:D2,>15000)” is entered in cell E2 and then copied to cell E3 and cell E4, which of the following is the value that is displayed in cell E4? (Table implies Product C data in B4:D4 is 10,000, 20,000, 30,000)
question.images: Implied figure showing spreadsheet data referenced in text

question.text: Which of the following is an Open Source Software (OSS) OS that is used in mobile devices such as smartphones and tablets?

options.text: Android
iOS
Safari
Windows

question.text: Which of the following is a device that is used to recognize handwritten characters and convert them into character codes?

options.text: BD-R
CD-R
OCR
OMR

question.text: Which of the following is an appropriate example of benefits of cookies?

options.text: When a person is registered beforehand as a reader, only e-mails whose content matches the registered genre and preference are delivered automatically.
When a search is performed by an Internet search engine, in addition to the search results, articles and advertisements with related content are displayed.
When a link to another person’s blog is pasted in one's own blog, a notification is sent automatically to the person.
When a user accesses a website that he/she has accessed before, the Web page is displayed according to the settings tailored to him/her.

question.text: Which of the following is an appropriate description concerning the characteristics of video distribution using streaming?

options.text: The data to be distributed must be stored on the server beforehand, and videos of events and sports cannot be distributed while they are being shot.
Deterioration in video quality due to partial loss of data in reception can be completely eliminated.
Warm-up time is not required for starting playback of a video, and therefore, the viewer can immediately start watching the video.
Rather than waiting for the entire video data to be downloaded, playback starts as soon as some data has been received.

question.text: When the “Department,” “Location,” and “Employee” tables are joined to create Table A, which of the following is the “Employee” table that is to be joined? Here, an underline indicates a primary key, and a dotted underline indicates a foreign key. (Table A contains Employee_number, Employee_name, Department_name, Location_name, Age.)
question.images: Implied figure showing database tables referenced in text

options.text: Employee_number (PK), Employee_name, Age
Employee_number (PK), Employee_name, Age, Location_code (FK)
Employee_number (PK), Employee_name, Age, Department_code (FK)
Employee_number (PK), Employee_name, Age, Department_code (FK), Location_code (FK)

question.text: From the “Product” table below, products whose supplier is “Company A” and the price is 1.40 dollars or more, and products whose supplier is “Company B” and the price is 1.70 dollars or less are extracted. Which of the following is a list of all of the obtained product names? (Table data provided showing Product Name, Price, and Supplier)
question.images: Implied figure showing product table data referenced in text

options.text: Cake, Strawberry, Coffee
Cake, Strawberry, Juice
Chocolate, Apple, Coffee
Chocolate, Apple, Juice

question.text: Which of the following is an appropriate search expression for searching for information concerning “men who are younger than 20 years and men who are older than 65 years”?

options.text: Men AND (less than 20 years AND more than 65 years)
Men AND (less than 20 years OR more than 65 years)
Men OR (less than 20 years AND more than 65 years)
Men OR (less than 20 years OR more than 65 years)

question.text: Which of the following is a database model that represents data in a table that is composed of rows and columns?

options.text: Object model
Hierarchical model
Relational model
Network model

question.text: Which of the following is the most appropriate description concerning a VPN that is used, for example, to connect a PC to a workplace network from outside via the Internet?

options.text: It provides several lines for connecting to the Internet and improves availability.
It guarantees the maximum delay time by controlling the timing of transmission.
It guarantees a minimum bandwidth by compressing the communication data.
It performs highly secure communications by using authentication and encryption of the communication data.

question.text: Which of the following is an appropriate description concerning a virus check for an e-mail?

options.text: A virus check is not required for the encrypted e-mail.
A virus check is not required for the received e-mail if the virus check is performed by the sender.
A virus check is performed even if the attached file has a file extension of “jpg”.
A virus check is performed only for the e-mail sent by an unknown sender.

question.text: Which of the following is the mechanism that determines the correspondence between domain names and IP addresses on the Internet?

options.text: DNS
FTP
SMTP
Web

question.text: Which of the following is the term that describes a network device copying a packet and sending it to multiple destinations?

options.text: DNS
URL
Multicast
Multilink

question.text: Which of the following is a wireless network that is used for IoT systems, and has power saving properties that enable operation for more than several years with a general battery and wide area properties that enable communication over a maximum distance of tens of kilometers?

options.text: LPWA
MDM
SDN
WPA2

question.text: All employees are registered in an entry control system with biometric authentication, and the employees who are allowed to enter each room within the company are specified. The exit from a room is not controlled. Among the following lists of the descriptions A through D, which is the list that contains all and only the items that can be achieved by the entry control system? A: Only authorized employees are allowed to enter a room. B: The time duration for which each person stayed in the room is recorded. C: Any attempts to enter a room but were denied the entry are recorded. D: The number of persons in a room is identified.

options.text: A, B, C
A, C
A, D
B, C, D

question.text: Which of the following is the most appropriate description concerning an information security policy for an organization?

options.text: It is a management’s role to implement not only the top-level information security policy, but also the rules and procedures for information security.
It is necessary to publish outside of the company not only the top-level information security policy, but also the rules and procedures for information security.
While the rules and procedures for information security should be tailored to the organization, the top-level information security policy must be adopted from the industry standard model.

Even when different information security measures are implemented in different departments of an organization, the top-level information security policy is recommended to be unified across the organization.

question.text: Which of the following is an explanation of DRM (Digital Rights Management), which is used for digital content?

options.text: It is data compression technology for audio and video, and there are multiple standards for the technology according to playback quality.
It is a collective term for technologies for protecting the copyright of content and restricting its use and duplication.
It is an XML-based description language for controlling data broadcasting on digital television.
It is a standard for reproducing realistic sound.

question.text: Which of the following is the most appropriate explanation of the operation that spyware is meant to perform?

options.text: To destabilize the operation of the OS and software
To delete files from the file system without user consent
To hijack the web browser and forcefully execute a particular operation
To collect personal and other information without being noticed by users

question.text: Which of the following is an appropriate description of S/MIME that is used for e-mails?

options.text: A service that a user can use from his or her web browser by sending or receiving e-mails on the website
A standard for securely sending and receiving e-mails between e-mail software by using a digital certificate
A protocol for transferring e-mails between e-mail servers
A protocol for e-mail software to receive e-mails

question.text: The communication protocol between a web browser and a web server was changed from HTTP to HTTPS. Which of the following does this achieve?

options.text: Improvement of transfer rate between a client PC and a web server
Prevention of computer virus infection
Protection of confidentiality in communication
Improvement of web browser display speed

question.text: In a file system that uses the access control methods below, which of the following settings for access rights to file A satisfies the requirements for access control? [Access control methods: Units for the setting of access rights: Owner; Users in the same group as the owner; Other users. Access rights: R (Read), W (Write), X (Execute). Priority: Owner > Group > Other. Requirements: All users are able to execute the file. Only the owner and users in the same group as the owner are able to read from the file. Only the owner is able to write to the file.]
question.images: Implied table of permissions referenced in text

options.text: Owner: R W X, Group: R W X, Other: – – *
Owner: R W X, Group: R – *, Other: * – *
Owner: R W X, Group: R – *, Other: * * –
Owner: R W X, Group: R – X, Other: – – *

question.text: Which of the following is a term for software that encrypts files on a computer in order to make them unusable, and demands money or other valuables in exchange for the decryption key?

options.text: Keylogger
Ransomware
Rootkit
Worm

question.text: Which of the following is an appropriate combination of terms or phrases to be inserted into A and B in the description below concerning identification of information security risks in ISMS? In the scope of ISMS, the risks that cause loss of confidentiality, ___A___, or availability of information are identified. ___B___

options.text: A) Outside the scope B) integrity
A) Outside the scope B) vulnerability
A) In the scope B) integrity
A) In the scope B) vulnerability

question.text: In a corporate network, which of the following is a server that should be installed in a corporate LAN rather than in the demilitarized zone (DMZ)?

options.text: An e-mail server that receives e-mails from outside the company
A DNS server where IP addresses of servers that are open to the public are registered
A file server that stores confidential information of the company
A web server that publishes information to the outside of the company

question.text: An IoT device with a vulnerability was used in large numbers by several companies. One (1) of the devices was infected with malware, and the infection spreads to many other IoT devices. On a certain date at a certain time, the many IoT devices that were infected with the malware attempted many connections to a certain website simultaneously, and this forced the service of the website to stop. Which of the following attacks was made against the website?

options.text: DDoS attack
Cross-site scripting
Dictionary attack
Social engineering

question.text: Which of the following is the order of the requirements definition phases in the system development?

options.text: Business requirements definition, system requirements definition, software requirements definition
Business requirements definition, software requirements definition, system requirements definition
System requirements definition, business requirements definition, software requirements definition
System requirements definition, software requirements definition, business requirements definition

question.text: Among the requirements for the design of screens A through D below, which of the following is the list that contains all the items that are to be considered for easy-to-use for system users? A: The time to recover from a failure B: The ease of learning of operation C: The layout of pushbuttons D: The size and color of text

options.text: A, B, C
A, B, D
A, C, D
B, C, D

question.text: Which of the following is an activity in software maintenance?

options.text: Program modifications that are requested by an ordering party to a developer as a result of an acceptance test for software
Creation of additional code for the functions that are discovered to be lacking in the unit test of a program
Fixing of bugs that are discovered in the unit test of a program
Program modifications to handle a system failure that occurs in actual operation

question.text: Which of the following is the appropriate description concerning the black box test?

options.text: The test is performed for all branches of the program.
The test is performed for all instructions of the program.
The test is performed on the basis of the internal structure of the program.
The test is performed by focusing on the input and the output of the program.

question.text: Which of the following is an appropriate description concerning the characteristics of the prototyping model?

options.text: Through a trial model in the initial stage of the development process, the user interface is determined and the system performance is verified, in order to reduce the risk of rework in subsequent phases.

It is a type of growth model where the system is refined by repeating development processes. In each iteration process, risk is assessed based on development cost and quality, and the process with the lowest risk is adopted.
Through a series of system development processes, some functions are completed. The entire system is developed in incremental steps by repeating such a cycle.
It is performed in order of requirements analysis, system design, production, and test. It is suitable for large-scale system development.

question.text: In order to achieve the objectives of a project, the roles, responsibilities, and skills required for project team members are determined, and the time periods of their participation are also clarified. Which of the following is the appropriate knowledge area of the project management processes where such activities are classified?

options.text: Project communication management
Project scope management
Project time management
Project human resource management

question.text: The response measure for risks in a project can be classified as avoidance, mitigation, acceptance, and transfer. In a system development project, the design and development process is to be subcontracted to Company A. In a previous system development, Company A suffered a delay for delivery, so it is also possible that a delay will occur in this project. Which of the following is a response measure that corresponds to mitigation of the risk of a delay?

options.text: The inclusion of causal analysis of the previous delay at Company A, and preventive measures on the basis of this analysis into the development plan
Cancellation of subcontracting to Company A
Inclusion in the contract of the term of the compensation for damages by Company A in the event of a delay
Inclusion in the project of the cost of measures in response to a delay

question.text: When a project is launched, which of the following is created by the project manager to run the project?

options.text: Request for proposal
Project implementation report
Project management plan
Requirements definition

question.text: A system development project has more defects than the quality targets. In order to clarify the issues to prioritize for resolution, the number of defects for each cause is to be investigated and shown with a chart. Which of the following is an appropriate chart to use? (Implied options are chart types like Pareto, Fishbone, etc.)
question.images: Implied figure showing chart options referenced in text

options.text: Chart A
Chart B
Chart C
Chart D

question.text: Which of the following is a hierarchical decomposition for the activities of creating project deliverables?

options.text: EVM
RFP
SLA
WBS

question.text: In the development of a system, the decision is made to subcontract the development from program implementation to integration testing to a vendor. A contract is concluded with the vendor that has the condition of reporting the progress and quality status at a weekly regular meeting, along with all the details of resolutions to any problem that has an impact on these things. Which of the following is the appropriate activity to confirm that the vendor is complying with the contract conditions?

options.text: When a problem has occurred on the vendor-side that impacts progress and quality, requesting a report in a regular meeting and confirming the details until the problem is resolved.
For problems that occur on the vendor-side that impacts progress and quality, confirming the details of their resolution with a report when the delivery is made.
For the work on the vendor-side, confirming progress and quality status and all the details of responses to problems that occurred with a report at the regular meeting.
For the work on the vendor-side, requesting a report on progress and quality status and confirming the results of work at the completion of each phase such as program implementation.

question.text: In a project where 60 programs are created with a budget of 18 million yen, when the status of the project was checked 20 days after the start of the project, it was found that 40 out of the 60 programs have been completed at a cost of 15 million yen. If the project continues to proceed at the same pace, what is the excess of cost over budget? Here, the scale of all programs and productivity are the same.

options.text: 3 million yen
4.5 million yen
6 million yen
7.5 million yen

question.text: Which of the following is the technical term that shows the management cycle in IT service management?

options.text: ITIL
PDCA
SLA
SLCP

question.text: Which of the following is an appropriate explanation concerning proactive countermeasures against various threats that hinder stable operation of information systems?

options.text: If unauthorized intrusion from the outside can be prevented completely, that is sufficient as a proactive countermeasure against unauthorized access.
It is difficult to predict natural disasters, so proactive countermeasures should focus on human-caused disasters.
If all data is backed up, no other proactive countermeasures are required.
Necessary proactive countermeasures should be taken, taking into consideration the trade-off between anticipated losses and costs of countermeasures.

question.text: An SLA contains a written description of arrangements, such as the content of the service agreed upon between a service provider and a service user. Which of the following is an appropriate merit that is obtained by both the service provider and the service user through concluding an SLA?

options.text: Being able to confirm the validity of the invoiced amount, based on the content of the service performed
Being able to have shared recognition of the content, scope of provision, and minimum required level of the service
Being able to negotiate fees when the content of the service is insufficient or incomplete
Being able to perform service operations without excessive demands placed on the content of service

question.text: Which of the following is an appropriate role of the service desk handling incident management when a system failure occurs?

options.text: Explaining already-known failure events and their workaround to users
Providing training to the users after handling the system failure
Performing an alternate processing for the business operation where the failure has occurred
Investigating the root cause of the failure

question.text: In IT service management, which of the following is the case where a person in charge of the service desk entrusts the resolution of a high-difficulty incident reported to the service desk to secondary support with specialized skills?

options.text: FAQ
SLA
Escalation
Workaround

question.text: Which of the following is a process where a third party inspects and evaluates the security and reliability of the information system of a company, and if necessary, the third party makes suggestions and recommendations to the party being inspected and evaluated.

options.text: System audit
System management
System design
System test

question.text: Which of the following is the most appropriate explanation of IT governance?

options.text: It is the organizational abilities of a company to control the creation and execution of its IT strategy with the purpose of building competitive superiority, and to lead it in the ideal direction.
It is the implementation and management of a good quality IT service that meets business needs.
It is an activity that a third party that is not an involved party nor its management verifies that implementation and operation of risk control concerning information systems are appropriate.
It is the application of the knowledge, skills, tools, and techniques to project activities in order to meet the requirements of the project.

question.text: Several functions are implemented for internal control by the system. Which of the following is the appropriate function that the process below implements? The login screen is displayed. A user enters the user ID and the password. If the combination of the user ID and the password matches the already-registered combination, the screen transits to the business menu screen. If not, the screen does not transit, and an error message is displayed.

options.text: Detection of a system failure
Access control by the system
Grant of access rights to the user
Confirmation of validity of password settings of the user

question.text: Which of the following is the most appropriate measure to lower the break-even sales for Company A that is in the manufacturing and sales industry?

options.text: Attempting to increase the production volume of a product by building new facilities that are the same as the current ones
Proceeding with the reduction of labor costs and the restructuring of indirect departments
Attempting to increase the sales volume of a product while maintaining the sales price at a certain level
Reducing the sales price of a product while maintaining the sales volume at the current level

question.text: The design quality of software is related to the skills of the designers, the design methods, the design tools, and other factors. Which of the following is an appropriate name for a diagram or a chart that resembles a fishbone and is used for identifying the items that affect the quality?

options.text: Arrow diagram
Cause and effect diagram
Pareto chart
Matrix diagram

question.text: In order to manufacture one (1) unit of a product, 10 kg of the raw material A and 5 kg of the raw material B are needed. If the amount of raw material that can be used in one (1) month is 60 kg of raw material A and 40 kg of raw material B, what is the maximum number of units of the product that can be manufactured in one (1) month?

The entire inventory of Warehouse A and Warehouse B is to be sent to Store C and Store D. The inventory volume of Warehouse A and Warehouse B is 35 items and 15 items respectively, and the required volume for Store C and Store D is 20 items and 30 items respectively. The shipment cost for each item from warehouse to store is as shown in the table. Under these conditions, what is the minimum total shipment cost in dollars? (Table data implied: A->C: 400, A->D: 200, B->C: 200, B->D: 100)
question.images: Implied figure showing shipment costs referenced in text

question.text: Which of the following is the most appropriate objective of improving the corporate brand?

options.text: Providing customers with value that the competitors cannot provide on the basis of the unique skills and technologies of the company
Bringing about competitive superiority by implicating the quality image of products and services from the company name, etc.
Gaining stakeholders’ empathy by announcing the basic concept of universal values of the company and corporate activities to the society by management executives and companies
Selling unique brands of products with low-price that are developed and produced in association with manufacturers on the basis of the leadership of distributors

question.text: In order to produce one (1) unit of product A, one (1) unit of component B that is procured externally is required. Component B is ordered on the first business day of every month. It is delivered on the last business day of the same month, and used in production from the next month. When the three-month production plan from April for product A is as shown in the table below, what is the minimum number of units of component B that must be ordered on the first business day in May? Here, the stock of component B at the end of March is 6,000 units, and 6,000 units have been ordered on the first business day of April. Products in progress and safety stock do not need to be considered.
question.images: Implied figure showing production plan table referenced in text

question.text: Which of the following is an expression that calculates gross profit?

options.text: (Sales) − (Cost of sales)
(Operating profit) + (Non-operating income) − (Non-operating expenses)
(Ordinary profit) + (Extraordinary profit) − (Extraordinary loss)
(Current net profit before tax) − (Corporate tax, local tax, and business tax)

question.text: Which of the following is an international book code?

options.text: EAN
ISBN
ITF
UPC

question.text: Among the various types of license agreements for a software package, which of the following is an appropriate explanation concerning a site license?

options.text: A software package can be used on multiple computers in a designated company or organization.
A software package can be used on a designated computer or a definite number of computers.
A software package can be installed on a designated server, and can also be used by any clients to access the server.
A software package can be used by a designated user or a definite number of users regardless of use or purpose.

question.text: Company S purchases equipment from Company K by using the procedure shown in the diagram below. In this transaction procedure, which of the following is the point where the sales contract is concluded? Here, once the quotation is provided, the content of the transaction does not change throughout the procedure. (Diagram shows steps: RFQ -> Quotation (A); Order form -> Acknowledgement (B); Delivery/Invoice (C); Receipt -> Payment (D))
question.images: Implied figure showing transaction diagram referenced in text

options.text: A
B
C
D

question.text: Among cases of sending e-mail, which of the following is the most appropriate from the viewpoint of consideration for the recipients?

options.text: A questionnaire on member satisfaction is sent by e-mail to all the addresses of 100 selected members entered in the “To” (destination) field.
A large-size document presenting a company’s products is sent to a customer as an e-mail attachment without being compressed.
A reply to an e-mail query from a customer about a product is sent also to those customers who should know about the details, by entering their addresses in the “Cc” (carbon copy) field.
An e-mail is sent to the limited customers by using the “Bcc” (blind carbon copy) field in order to inform them of the URL of the Web page of a special event.

question.text: Which of the following is a corporate activity of compliance promotion?

options.text: A mechanism for sharing sales people’s sales know-how, customer information, and negotiation information in the sales department is implemented to improve sales productivity.
A mechanism for sharing customer information and purchasing history among all departments that come into contact with customers is implemented to increase customer satisfaction.
Schedules, documents, messages, and meeting room reservation status are shared with groups such as departments and projects in order to prevent loss of communication.
A code of conduct or a conduct manual based on corporate ethics that aims to follow the law is created, and ethical education is implemented to ensure that employees understand them.

question.text: Which of the following is standardized as ISO (International Organization for Standardization) 27000 series?

options.text: Content management system
Information security management system
Talent management system
Knowledge management system

question.text: Which of the following is the type of retailing where the headquarters provides the business right, the right to use the trademark, and know-how about opening and running stores, on the basis of contracts with member stores, and collects royalties in return?

options.text: Outlet store
Concept shop
Franchise chain
Voluntary chain

question.text: Which of the following is an appropriate purpose of CRM?

options.text: To increase profits by building an excellent relationship with the customer from a long-term perspective
To optimize the delivery time and cost by improving the series of processes from procurement to manufacturing, distribution, and sales across several companies
To use management resources effectively by integrating and managing the information that is independently controlled in each department
To determine when and how much of materials required for manufacturing products is to be purchased on the basis of a bill of materials and inventory information

question.text: In order to consider near-term strategies, automobile manufacturer Company A identified its strengths and weaknesses, as well as the opportunities and threats it faces in the external environment. On the basis of the results, which of the following is appropriate as measures to leverage the company's strengths and overcome the threats? (SWOT details implied)
question.images: Implied figure showing SWOT matrix referenced in text

options.text: Extend the retirement age of skilled workers or implement rehiring
Procure funds at low interest and stockpile large reserves of oil
Conduct research and development and commercialize electric automobiles
Take advantage of brand image to strengthen sales capabilities

question.text: Which of the following is an appropriate description concerning M&A?

options.text: The analysis of the flow of business and the chain of value for the production of value of products and services provided by a company
The increase in autonomy in business strategy making by dividing a company by business or region
The drastic reform of business processes, and using IT to increase business throughput and cost efficiency
The acceleration of business deployment by fulfilling the functions that the company is lacking from other companies through corporate acquisition, etc.

question.text: Which of the following is an appropriate combination of the management themes and techniques for achieving them? [Management themes] A: A company wishes to develop efficient business processes that span from procurement of components to sales. B: A company wishes to understand customers’ preferences and other information, and use them in product planning and sales promotion. C: A company wishes to know the product name, quantity, and other sales-related information at the time of sale in order to restock appropriately and analyze strong-selling products. [Techniques] CRM, POS, SCM
question.images: Implied table matching themes and techniques referenced in text

options.text: A) SCM B) CRM C) POS
A) POS B) CRM C) SCM
A) CRM B) SCM C) POS
A) SCM B) POS C) CRM

question.text: Which of the following is the purpose of constructing an SCM system?

options.text: To evaluate the current strengths and weaknesses of a company, and decide the companies to partner with to complement the weaknesses

To reduce the product distribution inventory and improve customer satisfaction by mutually sharing and managing information such as production, inventory, and sales of products between departments and companies related to processes from production to consumption of products
To clarify where the value provided to customers is generated in the series of corporate activities such as procurement, development, manufacturing, sales, and service
To enable a company that produces and sells many types of products to determine the most efficient and effective combination of manufacturing and selling products in order to maximize profits

question.text: Which of the following is the most appropriate description of the API economy?

options.text: It is a mechanism where services with a higher added value are provided over the Internet by linking the services that are provided by a range of providers.
It is a mechanism for a copyright holder to release the source code for software for free via the Internet, etc.
It is a mechanism for streamlining work such as routine administrative work by using a software robot.
It is a mechanism for the distributed management of transaction history with multiple systems.

question.text: Which of the following is the situation where an improvement can be expected by installing a Material Requirements Planning (MRP) system?

options.text: Design drawings are managed on both electronic files and hard copies, so design change history cannot be accurately known.
Information concerning materials and their quantities required for manufacturing is complicated, so it is easy to miscalculate order quantities, and production is being adversely affected.
There are many design changes, so production efficiency does not improve.
High-mix, low-volume production is adopted, so the cost of installing production equipment is increasing.

question.text: Which of the following is a technology that is defined by some international standards and used for contactless IC cards, such as tickets for public transport?

options.text: IrDA
RFID
Bluetooth
Wi-Fi

question.text: Among the characteristics required for an embedded system, which of the following is the most appropriate terminology used when a certain process must be completed within a given period of time?

options.text: Availability
Reliability
Real-time ability
Serviceability

question.text: Which of the following is an appropriate explanation of CAD?

options.text: Education with the use of computers
Manufacturing with the use of computers
Design and drafting with the use of computers
Software design, development, and maintenance with the use of computers

question.text: The capability of Shogi (Japanese chess game) software is improved until it beats a professional player. Which of the following is the most appropriate technology that acts as the core for improvement of the capability of the Shogi software?

options.text: VR
ER
EC
AI

question.text: Which of the following is software for performing basic control of hardware mounted on a gaming console, household appliances, etc.?

options.text: Groupware
Shareware
Firmware
Middleware

question.text: Which of the following is an appropriate purpose of installing groupware?

options.text: To provide basic hardware control to such equipment as PCs and peripheral devices
To enhance the overall work efficiency of an organization by providing an environment for collaborative work
To enhance the organization’s Internet security by implementing a solution that combines both hardware and software into a single security product
To shorten the period of system development and improve the efficiency of maintenance by installing a suite of packaged software

question.text: Which of the following is the most appropriate description concerning the role of CIO?

options.text: Making an audit of the company from an objective standpoint in order to check if there is any problem with business operations or IT control works effectively
Playing a leading role in planning and execution of an information strategy for implementing a business strategy
Establishing a personnel system for implementing a business strategy, and controlling overall administrative operations such as understanding the actual situation of services
Improving the efficiency of allocating company funds, and ensuring the accuracy of financial accounting

question.text: Which of the following is a term that means that the development and operation of a system is farmed out to an overseas company or an overseas subsidiary?

options.text: Hosting
Offshore outsourcing
Onshore outsourcing
System integration

question.text: SOA (Service Oriented Architecture) is a concept of constructing a system by combining services. Which of the following is an appropriate merit of using SOA?

options.text: The processing speed of the system is improved.
The security of the system is strengthened.
The system users do not need education or training.
Flexiblility can be achieved for the system.

question.text: For the procurement of a system, which of the following is an appropriate combination of the words or terms corresponding to blanks A and B? In Company A, during the procurement of a new system, an RFI is presented to vendors with the aim of obtaining ___A___. Thereafter, an RFP is presented to the vendors with the aim of obtaining ___B___, and then a contractor is selected.
question.images: Implied figure showing RFI/RFP process referenced in text

options.text: A) technology trend research reports B) proposals
A) technology trend research reports B) non-disclosure agreements
A) financial statements B) proposals
A) Proposals B) technology trend research reports

question.text: When the software life cycle is divided into the planning process, requirements definition process, development process, and operation process, which of the following is an appropriate activity in the requirements definition process?

options.text: Business process and system transition
Computerization planning
Software detailed design
Stakeholders’ needs identification

question.text: Which of the following is an appropriate approver for the optimization plan of the overall information system of a company?

options.text: CIO
